amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow for-profit Head Start providers under certain conditions to retain a portion of administrative savings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 109-229 to allow for profit providers of Head Start services to take profit from 15% administrative account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Musgrave amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 241 (Roll no. 491).
